com.facebook.buck.util.concurrent

Class ListeningMultiSemaphore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.concurrent.ListeningMultiSemaphore

  • public class ListeningMultiSemaphore
extends Object
    A semaphore using ListenableFutures for acquisition of different resource types rather than blocking.

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Void> acquire(ResourceAmounts resources)
        Returns the future which will be completed by the moment when resources will be acquired. Future may be returned already completed. You should subscribe to the future and perform your resource requiring job once the future will be completed and not cancelled. When you finish your job, you must release acquired resources by calling release() method below.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resource amounts that need to be acquired. If they are higher than maximum amounts, they will be capped to them.
        Returns:
        Future that will be completed once resource will be acquired.

      • release

        public void release(ResourceAmounts resources)
        Releases previously acquired resources.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resource amounts that need to be released. This argument should match one you used during resource acquiring.

        public ResourceAmounts getAvailableResources()
